title.rendered: Eastern Cape vs Joburg, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Eastern Cape: Adam Rossington (wk), Jordan Hermann, Sarel Erwee, Aiden Markram (c), Jordan Cox, Tristan Stubbs, Marco Jansen, Ayabulela Gqamane, Roelof van der Merwe, Brydon Carse/Ottniel Baartman, Sisanda Magala

Joburg: Reeza Hendricks, Faf du Plessis (c), Leus du Plooy, Donavon Ferreira, Lewis Gregory, Romario Shepherd, Kyle Verreynne (wk), Alzarri Joseph, Gerald Coetzee, Nandre Burger, Aaron Phangiso

Pitch Report

Venue: St George’s Park, Gqeberha

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 164

2nd innings average score: 152

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

In the last 2 games at St George’s Park, Aiden Markram scored a fifty and took 4 wickets. In this season, he has made it to the Ultimate Team in all 5 games.

Sisanda Magala too has impressive numbers at the venue. In 29 games, he has taken 31 wickets (the most) including the best figures of 5 for 28.

Tristan Stubbs’ role is to use the long handle right away, and despite this approach, he averages 43 in 9 games at the venue and has struck at a mind-boggling strike rate of 183.

Faf du Plessis has appeared in the Ultimate Team in 3 of 5 matches. He has collected the most points by a Joburg batter.

In his last 5 games, Reeza Hendricks has registered 4 single-digit scores.

In the last 3 games at the venue, 24 of 37 wickets belonged to the pacers and 3 of 4 fifties were scored by an opener.
